title: HTML & CSS Complete Guide
subtitle: Build Beautiful Websites from Scratch
description: A hands-on walkthrough of modern HTML5 and CSS3 — semantic markup, the box model, Flexbox, CSS Grid, and responsive design. Packed with quizzes and real-world projects to cement every concept.

title: JavaScript: Zero to Pro
subtitle: Master Modern JavaScript ES6+
description: From variables, functions and loops to DOM manipulation and HTML forms — a structured 5-chapter journey through JavaScript fundamentals with hands-on examples every step of the way.

title: Django Web Framework
subtitle: Full-Stack Python Web Development
description: Build production-ready web apps with Django — models, views, templates, ORM, authentication, and REST APIs. Also covers Flask as a companion lightweight framework.

title: Flask Microframework
subtitle: Lightweight Python APIs & Web Apps
description: Build lightweight, fast web APIs and apps with Flask. Covers routing, Jinja2 templates, SQLAlchemy, Blueprints, and deploying Flask applications to production environments.

title: Python for Data Science
subtitle: NumPy, Pandas, Matplotlib & Beyond
description: 17-chapter Python journey — from syntax basics through OOP, NumPy, Pandas, Matplotlib, Web APIs, and database connectivity. Includes mock exams and IBM Python Certification practice tests.

title: Statistics for Data Science
subtitle: Probability, Inference & Analytics
description: Master the statistical foundations every data scientist needs — probability distributions, hypothesis testing, correlation, regression analysis, and Bayesian thinking with real-world examples.

title: AWS Cloud Essentials
subtitle: Amazon Web Services from Zero
description: Get cloud-ready with AWS core services — EC2, S3, IAM, Lambda, RDS, and CloudWatch — with hands-on examples and real infrastructure patterns. Designed for developers new to cloud.

title: Git & GitHub Mastery
subtitle: Version Control for Every Developer
description: Everything about Git and GitHub — branching strategies, pull requests, merge conflict resolution, GitHub Actions CI/CD, and collaborative workflows used by real development teams.

title: Java Programming
subtitle: Core Java from Fundamentals to Advanced
description: 17-chapter interactive Java guide — from syntax and OOP through Collections, Exception Handling, Java 8 features, Multithreading, and GUI with Swing. Ends with real capstone mini-projects.

title: Computer Networking
subtitle: Protocols, Architectures & the Web
description: Understand how the internet works — OSI model, TCP/IP, DNS, HTTP/HTTPS, CISCO networking fundamentals, routing, subnetting, and the basics of network security every developer should know.
